headline.main: SEEKS AUTOGRAPHS FOR GIFT TO QUEEN; Bundles for Britain Starts House-to-House Drive Today for Million Signatures

lead_paragraph: An autograph campaign to top all such efforts will be launched today by Bundles for Britain, Inc., 475 Fifth Avenue, as it sends its volunteer workers out -- fountain pens in hand -- to obtain 1,000,000 signatures and contributions from the signers.
abstract: Bundles for Brit plans autograph and fund drive for presentation to Queen Elizabeth, N Y C; U S RAF Benevolent Fund gets motion-picture industry gift; Brit War Relief Soc Private Service Div plans benefit dance, N Y C

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MOTION PICTURE PRODUCERS AND DISTRIBUTORS OF AMER INC
